scripts.start: echo 'ğŸš€ Starting the app...' && npm run build && node dist/index.js
scripts.build: echo 'ğŸ”¨ Building the app...' && webpack --mode production
scripts.lint: echo 'ğŸ§¹ Linting code...' && eslint . && echo 'âœ… Linting completed!'
scripts.lint:fix: echo 'ğŸ›  Fixing lint issues...' && eslint . --fix && echo 'âœ… Linting fixes applied!'
scripts.precommit: echo 'ğŸ”’ Precommit: Linting and testing code...' && npm run lint && npm test
scripts.pretest: echo 'ğŸ” Pretest: Linting code...' && npm run lint
scripts.debug: echo 'ğŸ Starting the app in debug mode...' && NODE_ENV=development nodemon --inspect src/index.js
scripts.clean: echo 'ğŸ§½ Cleaning up...' && rm -rf ./node_modules ./dist ./coverage && rm package-lock.json && npm cache clean --force
scripts.prepare: husky install # ğŸ¶ Setting up Husky
scripts.create-zip: echo 'ğŸ“¦ Creating ZIP file...' && cd .. && zip -r algorithm-practice-extension.zip algorithm-practice-extension/*
scripts.package-extension: echo 'ğŸ“¦ Packaging extension...' && npm run remove-dsstore && npm run create-zip
